casebody.data:
Michael Byron ABRAHAMSON, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 12-8683. Supreme Court of the United States June 24, 2013.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit for further consideration in light of Alleyne v. United States, --- U.S. ----, 133 S.Ct. 2151, --- L.Ed. ---- (2013).
